lead_paragraph: The email documented a call from the mayor of Fort Lee, N.J., to a young staff member in Gov. Chris Christie’s office, in which the mayor complained about public safety hazards from the shutdowns.

headline.print_headline: Co-Worker Says Christie Aide Asked Her to Delete Email About Lane Closings
headline.main: Witness Says Christie Aide Asked Her to Delete Email About Lane Closings

snippet: The email documented a call from the mayor of Fort Lee, N.J., to a young staff member in Gov. Chris Christie’s office, in which the mayor complained about public safety hazards from the shutdowns....
abstract: Christina Renna testifies that c-worker Bridget Anne Kelly asked her in December 2013 to delete email written in September during lane closings on George Washington Bridge; email documents call to staff member in New Jersey Gov Chris Christie's office, in which Fort Lee Mayor Mark Sokolich complained about safety hazards from shutdowns.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
